name: Crock Pot Oatmeal with Apple and Cinnamon
description: Have you tried slow cooker oatmeal yet? This crock pot oatmeal with quinoa, apples, and cinnamon is my new favorite! So delicious and creamy!
recipeIngredient: 2 cups oat or almond milk milk

recipeInstructions.text: Put all ingredients except for the walnuts in a slow cooker. Cook on low for 9 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Put all ingredients except for the walnuts in a slow cooker. Cook on low for 9 hours.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve warm with some fresh apple chunks and chopped walnuts.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve warm with some fresh apple chunks and chopped walnuts.
